details.arabic_diacless: رب انى لماۤ انزلت الى من خير فقير‏
details.arabic: رَبِّ اِنِّىۡ لِمَاۤ اَنۡزَلۡتَ اِلَىَّ مِنۡ خَيۡرٍ فَقِيۡرٌ‏
details.transliteration: Rabbi innee lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqeer
details.translations: My Lord, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need.

pageTitle: Seeking whatever good Allah can bestow [28:24]
